welcomeSteps.title: Hello! I'm the Knowledge Guardian.
welcomeSteps.text: Welcome to Arbor. We believe knowledge is a right, not a privilege. Here, every lesson you learn is a seed that helps this forest of wisdom grow for everyone.

welcomeSteps.title: Explore like a Map
welcomeSteps.text: Navigation is simple. Drag the map to move around, and click on the circles to expand topics and reveal new lessons.

welcomeSteps.title: Collect your Seeds
welcomeSteps.text: As you complete modules, you'll collect unique Seeds for your personal backpack. Your garden will grow with every lesson you master!

welcomeSteps.title: Play & Learn (Arcade)
welcomeSteps.text: Learning is playing. Visit the Arcade to find games that use AI to generate unique levels based on the lesson you are currently studying.

welcomeSteps.title: Activate my Superintelligence (AI)
welcomeSteps.text: By default, I guide you using the lesson text. You can upgrade my brain by connecting to the Cloud AI.

welcomeSteps.title: Your Data is Private (Offline)
welcomeSteps.text: Important: Your progress lives 100% in this browser. To save it or move it to another device, go to your Profile and Export your backpack file.

aiPitchSub: Click the Owl icon ü¶â to configure AI.
missionText: Arbor is a decentralized, community-built educational platform powered by Treesys. Its goal is to democratize access to information, allowing anyone to learn, contribute, and improve the global curriculum in a transparent and collaborative way. Education is a human right, not a business.
metaphorText: Like a tree, knowledge is nourished by the community (roots) to expand its branches and offer leaves of wisdom (lessons) to anyone who wishes to explore them.
impressumText: Arbor‚Ñ¢ is a product of Treesys¬Æ. All content is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. Arbor is not an accredited educational institution.

pdfDisclaimerText:
This document was automatically generated by Arbor UI, a decentralized knowledge explorer.
Source Repository: {url}

The content, text, images, and intellectual property contained herein belong exclusivley to the authors and maintainers of the external repository linked above. Arbor UI (Treesys) acts solely as a visualization engine and assumes no responsibility for the accuracy, legality, copyright status, or safety of the material presented in this document. Users are responsible for verifying the source of the information.

sageGdprText: This feature uses Puter.com, a third-party service, to provide Artificial Intelligence capabilities. By proceeding, your messages will be processed by Puter.com's servers according to their own privacy policies. Arbor UI does not store or have access to your conversation history.
privacyText:
1. Data Controller

{impressum}

2. Data Collection & Storage

Local Data: By default, Arbor UI operates 100% locally. All your progress (completed lessons, seeds, etc.) is stored exclusively in your browser (using LocalStorage). We do not have access to this data.

Cloud Data (Optional): If you choose to connect your Puter.com account for Cloud Sync or AI features (Arbor Sage), your data (progress, username, avatar, and AI interactions) will be sent to and processed by Puter.com's servers. This functionality is optional and requires your explicit consent.

3. Third-Party Services & Data Transfers

Arbor UI utilizes the following third-party services that may process your data:

  • Puter.com (Optional): For Cloud Sync and Artificial Intelligence features. The use of these services is subject to Puter.com's privacy policy.
  • GitHub Pages (Hosting): The application is hosted on GitHub Pages. GitHub may collect technical data like your IP address for security and analytics purposes, according to their privacy policy.
  • CDNs (Google Fonts, TailwindCSS): For loading interface assets. These services may log your IP address.

4. Your Rights

You can access and delete your local data at any time by clearing your browser's site data for this application. To manage data stored on Puter.com, you must refer to their platform and privacy policies.
syncLoginWarningBody:
By connecting with Puter.com, your local progress will be replaced by the cloud backup if one exists.

Your Username and Avatar will be stored in your Puter.com account to identify your session across devices.
arcadeDesc: Context-aware educational games. Play games that adapt to what you are learning.
arcadeDisclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è AI Generated Content: This game uses Artificial Intelligence to generate content on the fly. Content is processed by Puter.com (Cloud) or Ollama (Local) depending on your configuration.
arcadeDeveloperNote: Developer Note: Games receive context via URL parameters (?source=...&module=...). Create your own engine!
